channel.title: International CES Attendee News
channel.description: Stay up-to-date on the latest developments for 2007 International CES attendees.

item.title: Go for the Gold at CES
item.description: Vehicle Communication & Safety TechZone in the LVCC Gold Lot at CES demos intelligent transportation technology.

item.title: Hundreds of New Products Launch at CES Daily
CES' Newest Venue Contributes to Largest Show Floor in Show's History
item.description: Sands Expo and Convention Center/The Venetian features hundreds of exhibitors, keynote speakers and more.

item.title: Audio. Digital Imaging. Mobile Electronics. Wireless. Gaming. All at CES.
item.description: CES runs Monday through Thursday and features 2,700 exhibitors.

item.title: Slash Makes Visit to Gibson Guitar Exhibit
item.description: Guns N Roses and Velvet Revolver axeman hangs out at CES.

item.description: Get ready for a Great Audio Experience.

item.description: International SuperSession Shows The Future of Technology Policy, Offers Global Networking

item.title: Mobile and in-car electronics rev up.
item.description: CES to host over 240 exhibitors and 40 conference sessions for mobile/in-car electronics.

item.title: Hottest gaming technology on display at the 2007 International CES
item.description: The Gaming TechZone is where you need to be.

item.title: Top satellite, broadcast, cable and telco execs speak out.

item.title: Can MyCES Personal Planner make you smarter?
item.description: Let MyCES pick your conference sessions.

item.title: CBS CEO completes keynote lineup at the 2007 International CES.
item.description: Leslie Moonves will complete day two with a keynote address slated for 4:30 p.m. Tuesday, January 9.

item.title: FCC Chairman returns to the 2007 International CES.
item.description: Kevin Martin returns to Industry Insider Series.

item.title: CEA to sponsor and co-produce event in the United Arab Emirates.
item.description: International CES/Hometech Middle East to feature latest in consumer electronics, home appliances and home automation systems.

item.title: Innovations 2007 Design and Engineering Awards honorees announced today.
item.description: If you're looking for the future of consumer electronics, then look no further.

item.title: New Industry Insider added to CES conference session lineup.

item.title: Nokia CEO joins Industry Insider lineup.

item.title: CES conference sessions announced.
item.description: Want to know the trends? We've got 'em. Want to meet the industry's influencers? You can.
